Olympus Armor

Hello %nick%

This is an NPC that will allow you to obtain Olympus armor. Then you have to kill the monsters in Antharas Lair outside and get Olympus books.

After you have collected enough Olympus books, you can choose a reward in the form of a recipes or pieces for Olympus Armor.


Monsters:
Drakos Hunter, Drakos Assassin


Reward:
1x Recipe = 500x Olympus books
5x Piece = 100x Olympus books



You must be level 80
www.l2.minius.eu
